name: Heat control
description:
Play as a firefighter whose goal is to take out as many fires as you can during each stage.
Pour water or use Fire extinguisher on to the fires to take them out.

If one tree burns - you lose one life. 

Controls:
A W S D or Arrow buttons to move
E to take water with bucket
F to use items
G to drop items

Known issues after game build:
Main menu stopped working, that is why right now it is made as Level 1.
The fire behaves slower than it did inside of Unity editor, which makes the game a lot easier than it was meant to be.

A first solo GameJam attempt by ShortE
